help.short: The name of the mobile network.
The name of the service. You must not use any of the following reserved strings - `default`, `requested` or `service`

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="pccRules" required="True" identifiers="ruleName">
<prop type="array" name="serviceDataFlowTemplates" required="True" identifiers="templateName">
<prop type="array" name="ports">
<prop type="array" name="protocol" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="remoteIpList" required="True">

command.name: delete
command.confirmation: Are you sure you want to perform this operation?

help.short: The name of the mobile network.
The name of the service. You must not use any of the following reserved strings - `default`, `requested` or `service`

command.name: create

help.short: The name of the mobile network.
The name of the service. You must not use any of the following reserved strings - `default`, `requested` or `service`
The geo-location where the resource lives

command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.pccRules" options="pcc-rules" required="True" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.pccRules[].serviceDataFlowTemplates" options="service-data-flow-templates" required="True">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.pccRules[].serviceDataFlowTemplates[].ports" options="ports"> <help short="The port(s) to which UEs will connect for this flow. You can specify zero or more ports or port ranges. If you specify one or more ports or port ranges then you must specify a value other than `ip` in the `protocol` field. This is an optional setting. If you do not specify it then connections will be allowed on all ports. Port ranges must be specified as -. For example: [`8080`, `8082-8085`]."/>
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.pccRules[].serviceDataFlowTemplates[].protocol" options="protocol" required="True">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.pccRules[].serviceDataFlowTemplates[].remoteIpList" options="remote-ip-list" required="True">

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="pccRules" arg="$parameters.properties.pccRules" required="True" identifiers="ruleName">
<prop type="array" name="serviceDataFlowTemplates" arg="$parameters.properties.pccRules[].serviceDataFlowTemplates" required="True" identifiers="templateName">
<prop type="array" name="ports" arg="$parameters.properties.pccRules[].serviceDataFlowTemplates[].ports">
<prop type="array" name="protocol" arg="$parameters.properties.pccRules[].serviceDataFlowTemplates[].protocol" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="remoteIpList" arg="$parameters.properties.pccRules[].serviceDataFlowTemplates[].remoteIpList" required="True">

<prop type="array" name="pccRules" required="True" identifiers="ruleName">

<prop type="array" name="protocol" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="remoteIpList" required="True">

command.name: update

help.short: The name of the mobile network.
The name of the service. You must not use any of the following reserved strings - `default`, `requested` or `service`

command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.pccRules" options="pcc-rules" group="Properties">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.pccRules[].serviceDataFlowTemplates" options="service-data-flow-templates">
<arg nullable="True" type="array" var="$parameters.properties.pccRules[].serviceDataFlowTemplates[].ports" options="ports"> <help short="The port(s) to which UEs will connect for this flow. You can specify zero or more ports or port ranges. If you specify one or more ports or port ranges then you must specify a value other than `ip` in the `protocol` field. This is an optional setting. If you do not specify it then connections will be allowed on all ports. Port ranges must be specified as -. For example: [`8080`, `8082-8085`]."/>
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.pccRules[].serviceDataFlowTemplates[].protocol" options="protocol">
<arg type="array" var="$parameters.properties.pccRules[].serviceDataFlowTemplates[].remoteIpList" options="remote-ip-list">

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="pccRules" required="True" identifiers="ruleName">
<prop type="array" name="serviceDataFlowTemplates" required="True" identifiers="templateName">
<prop type="array" name="ports">
<prop type="array" name="protocol" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="remoteIpList" required="True">

<prop type="array" name="pccRules" arg="$parameters.properties.pccRules" required="True" identifiers="ruleName">
<prop type="array" name="serviceDataFlowTemplates" arg="$parameters.properties.pccRules[].serviceDataFlowTemplates" required="True" identifiers="templateName">
<prop type="array" name="ports" arg="$parameters.properties.pccRules[].serviceDataFlowTemplates[].ports">
<prop type="array" name="protocol" arg="$parameters.properties.pccRules[].serviceDataFlowTemplates[].protocol" required="True">
<prop type="array" name="remoteIpList" arg="$parameters.properties.pccRules[].serviceDataFlowTemplates[].remoteIpList" required="True">
